Complete SOH CAH TOA Trigonometry Mnemonic T-Shirt
OH CAH TOA is a commonly used mnemonic used in the mathamatics of trigonometry to remember the sine, cosine, and tangent ratios of a right triangle.
This design makes a great gift for math nerds, trig teachers, mathematic professors, or anyone who enjoys a bit of trig!

An imaginary triangle is a right triangle with one side of length 1, one side of length i (that is, the square root of negative once), and a hypotenuse of length zero.
Do the math using the Pythagorean theorem (a^2 + b^2 = c^2) and you'll see the math works!
